component.name: SubLime
component.summary: Lightweight controller for Elgato Key Lights

description.p: SubLime is a lightweight Elgato Key Light controller for Linux. It discovers Key Lights on your LAN and lets you control power, brightness, and color temperature without the bloat.
It runs a small local helper daemon that talks to the lights and exposes a localhost HTTP API so you can build your own integrations (like an Open Deck plugin).
